name: Quad Damage
description:
Thank you for taking a look at Quad Damage

The Tech Demo is just designed to test out different functions in our engine. This is not the official game. The level that you will play in the Tech Demo won't even be in the final game.  We want people to try and break the game during the tech demo. Different things like sound queues, boss fights, etc will be added in the next version of the tech demo. Please Give any feedback that you have. Let us know of any bugs you have found. Screenshots and videos are welcome
